## Source: ossf-package-analysis (0c6d541610ea02e1c898560a24798cf5ccb4c38d66f367bc6f205cc4fe5377dc)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'microsoft.applicationinsights.persistencechannel' @ 99.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
